EmailTemplate.name: RE: Intro For Hiring Managers (1315856604.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Intro For Hiring Managers (1315856604.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Jason,
On behalf of everyone here at MBO Partners, we look forward to working with you and your organization. If you have 10 minutes I would love to share some background on our organization and also understand your business to ensure we process everything according to the way you would like.
You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here: https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK as my calendar is currently filled for the remainder of the day.
Here is quick summary of who we are you may review before we speak: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf
I look forward to speaking with you.
Thank you, Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
